tool_description: This API helps to query realtime COVID-19 vaccination location and vaccine availability.
name: COVID-19 Live Vaccination Finder
title: COVID-19 Live Vaccination Finder

api_list.name: Get All Locations By Vaccine Manufacturer
api_list.description: Gets the locations of available vaccines by a vaccine manufacturer query.

api_list.name: Get Locations By In Stock Status
api_list.description: Get request that returns all locations that have the vaccine in stock.

api_list.name: Get Locations By City, State
api_list.description: Get request that returns locations based off of a city and state query. City and State params are not case sensitive.

api_list.name: Get Vaccine Locations By Boundary
api_list.description: Get request that takes NE and SW latitudes and longitudes as query params, then returns all locations within that boundary.

api_list.name: Get Vaccine Locations By Zip
api_list.description: Get method that queries vaccine locations by zip

api_list.name: Get Vaccine Locations By State
Get All Vaccine Locations
api_list.description: This endpoint returns back all vaccine locations and their details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-live-vaccination-finder.p.rapidapi.com/locations/list-all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-live-vaccination-finder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-live-vaccination-finder.p.rapidapi.com/locations/list-all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-live-vaccination-finder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
